burlap.oomdp.stochasticgames

Interface JointReward

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridGame.GGJointRewardFunction, SingleStageNormalFormGame.SingleStageNormalFormJointReward

    public interface JointReward
    This interface defines the method needed to return the reward received by each agent.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> reward(State s, JointAction ja, State sp)
      Returns the reward received by each agent specified in the joint action.

    • Method Detail

      • reward

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> reward(State s,
                                                      JointAction ja,
                                                      State sp)
        Returns the reward received by each agent specified in the joint action. The returned result is a Map from agent names to the reward that they received.
        Parameters:
        s - that state in which the joint action was taken.
        ja - the joint action taken.
        sp - the resulting state from taking the joint action
        Returns:
        a Map from agent names to the reward that they received.
